Articles.Content:
> 
> Matt is pretty excited. He's agonizing on the FINAL COUNTDOWN to v1.0 !!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> [https://vimeo.com/126125469](https://vimeo.com/126125469)

This is freaking genius. Him waving and completely breaking down at the end is hilarious.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> But that's plaid...

It's the same thing.

\*Sings\* I'm a special little snowflake! \*Sings\*

[h=1]Server Migration[/h]Kerbal Space Program website is in maintenance mode while we are performing a Server Migration.

We appreciate your patience.

![contact_kerbal.png](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/contact/contact_kerbal.png)

Oh, and HYPE!!!

> 
> I see nothing on those pages.
> Should I dare try IE?

If I understand correctly, it is the server being down, not your browser.

I do believe it's almost time:

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/AMLZ8wTVPFI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Thanks Kyle, I had an earlier version that I posted on Reddit that used the original theme music, but I thought this music was TONS better! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
\*snowflakes those that do see the image\*

> 
> But that's plaid...

Sorry, my brains are going into my feet. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I still see the same old images.

> 
> If I understand correctly, it is the server being down, not your browser.

I know it's not my browser that's down, I was being sarcastic or pedantic or whatever it is.

> 
> But that's plaid...

Plaid factor 5.9 is what we're at, if my sources serve correctly.
Anyone else going to do one final mission to kill time?

that is amazing

and I noticed another 1.0 addition

on the launch from Duna the rockets blasted dust away
The train is going BEYOND THE THEORETICAL LIMITS OF SANITY HOW FAST MUST WE GO?

> 
> Anyone else going to do one final mission to kill time?

And then spend 30 minutes reading all the posts to catch up??? I don't think so!

> 
> Anyone else going to do one final mission to kill time?

Nope, I already made a clean slate last night.

Anyone else noticed the website taking longer to refresh the maintenance screen?

I reckon they are waiting until the level of F5 reaches DDOS levels and then they will release it.
all missions have been grounded and drones extinguished in preparation.

> 
> Matt is pretty excited. He's agonizing on the FINAL COUNTDOWN to v1.0 !!! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> [https://vimeo.com/126125469](https://vimeo.com/126125469)

Best HYPE ever!
Om my gosh, I think we're approaching double-super-epic-ninja rates!
Posts are coming in faster than I can read 'em

> 
> Anyone else noticed the website taking longer to refresh the maintenance screen?
> I reckon they are waiting until the level of F5 reaches DDOS levels and then they will release it.

Nope. Not loading slower for me.

> 
> \*Sings\* I'm a special little snowflake! \*Sings\*
> [h=1]Server Migration[/h]Kerbal Space Program website is in maintenance mode while we are performing a Server Migration.
> 
> We appreciate your patience.
> 
> [https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/contact/contact_kerbal.png](https://kerbalspaceprogram.com/images/contact/contact_kerbal.png) 
> 
> Oh, and HYPE!!!

You're excited about this. You also seem to have been on the forums for longer than I've slept for. Are you feeling okay?
Post rate is accelerating to ludicrous speed!

> 
> Anyone else going to do one final mission to kill time?

I tried, but I can't concentrate on account of all the HYPE

> 
> Anyone else noticed the website taking longer to refresh the maintenance screen?
> I reckon they are waiting until the level of F5 reaches DDOS levels and then they will release it.

That would be cruel, release it right when we can't access the site because we are "attacking" it.
